headline.main: President's Words Recall Five Added to His Party's Platform

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 28 -- Four words in the President's Navy Day speech last night are being accepted here today as his own evidence in rebuttal of the charge that his present foreign policy violates the Democratic platform of 1940 and his anti-war campaign pledges in that same year.
abstract: Roosevelt says Kearny was hit "from outside,"
